title: hA hanta santApam
sahitya:
hA hanta santApam jnyArODu paravu


anupallavi

  mOham vaLarnnETTAm dAham tALarunnayyO


caraNam 1    sOma kiraNattinAl bhObiccu vilasunna yAminikaLil varan prEmamODu viravil 
kAma kELikaL melle kAmini ceytatum sAmaja sugamenE sarasalaran marannO
    caraNam 2    munnam nidrayiloru mOhana tarAngi tanmODu ramiccumE taruNa mennahO kaNDu 
khinnayAyuLLana mAm krpayODa svAsipicca pannaga shayanan shrI padmanAbhan marannO
